synopsis.text:
Shirayuki-hime, known for her striking red hair and expertise as an apothecary, leads a peaceful life in Tanbarun until the day she catches the eye of the impetuous Prince Raji. Refusing to be his concubine, she boldly cuts her hair and flees into the forest, where she encounters Zen, the second prince of the neighboring kingdom of Clarines. Inspired by Zen's kindness and courage, Shirayuki embarks on a journey to become the court herbalist in Zen's kingdom, leaving behind her old life.

As Shirayuki navigates the complexities of the royal palace and the challenges of her new role, she forges strong friendships and faces formidable adversaries. Alongside Zen, who strives to become a worthy prince, they support each other in their respective paths. In this captivating tale of courage, determination, and friendship, witness Shirayuki's growth as she defies expectations and redefines her destiny in the enchanting world of Akagami no Shirayuki-hime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
